p: LHDs selected organizations to dispense publicly purchased antivirals for the following reasons: to reach the uninsured or underinsured (89%), to reach severely ill persons (61%), to reach medically at-risk persons such as pregnant women (57%), and/or because the organization was well-known in the community (61%). LHDs also noted that dispensing sites were chosen based on storage capacity or the ability of a pharmacy to correctly reconstitute antiviral suspension for children.
